item.title: Louisville, KY and Southern Indiana Wedding Photography from Stephen A Harmon, photojournalist
item.itunes:author: Stephen A Harmon
item.itunes:subtitle: Wedding shots, both candid and group poses, wedding album layouts, short slideshow just over a minute long
item.itunes:summary: Weddings are what we do! Wedding shots, both candid and group poses, wedding album layouts, short slideshow just over a minute long. Steve's philosophy: it's YOUR day, not his. It's all about you, and he captures the moments you'll cherish forever.
item.description: Weddings are what we do! Wedding shots, both candid and group poses, wedding album layouts, short slideshow just over a minute long. Steve's philosophy: it's YOUR day, not his. It's all about you, and he captures the moments you'll cherish forever.
